r.d: Memcached is a caching daemon designed especially for dynamic web applications to decrease database load by storing objects in memory. This extension allows you to work with memcached through handy OO and procedural interfaces.
r.n: - PHP 5.4 compatibility - Fixed return value error get_host_port_from_server(). - Fixed PECL Bug #16672 (memcache.php doesn't support unix socket) - Fixed pecl bug #19374 (memcache.php throws Notice: Undefined index: VALUE when viewing expired items)
